channel.title: *[317]* How to change what stats (::pure) *[317]*
channel.description:
My ::pure gives 99 magic, 99 str, 99 att, 99 range and 99 magic, 99hp
I want it to have 1 magic, 70 str 60 att, 99 range and 1 magic and 99 hp
How can i change that? Thanks~
Oh and how can i enable Dropping items?

item.title: *[317]* How to change what stats (::pure) *[317]*
item.dc:creator: @loved loved
item.description:
@loved wrote:

thanks for your help guys~I’m done.

Read full topic

item.title: *[317]* How to change what stats (::pure) *[317]*
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

Open client.java;
CTRL+F

Search “custom”

find your pure command, delete it and put this:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”)) {
addSkillXP(xpamount, skillid#);
}

Etc. and repeat for the stats you want.

Read full topic

item.title: *[317]* How to change what stats (::pure) *[317]*
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“anitdragon13, post:2, topic:304613”]in ur client file find the commans
then put in this one
"if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addSkillXP(486000000, 0);
addSkillXP(0, 1);
addSkillXP(486000000, 2);
addSkillXP(486000000, 3);
addSkillXP(486000000, 4);
addSkillXP(0, 5);
addSkillXP(486000000, 6);
addSkillXP(486000000, 7);
addSkillXP(486000000, 8);
addSkillXP(486000000, 9);
addSkillXP(486000000, 10);
addSkillXP(486000000, 11);
addSkillXP(486000000, 12);
addSkillXP(486000000, 13);
addSkillXP(486000000, 14);
addSkillXP(486000000, 15);
addSkillXP(486000000, 16);
addSkillXP(486000000, 17);
addSkillXP(486000000, 18);
addSkillXP(486000000, 19);
addSkillXP(486000000, 20);
addSkillXP(486000000, 21);
addSkillXP(486000000, 22);
addSkillXP(486000000, 23);
addSkillXP(486000000, 24);
sendMessage(“N33b!.”); "[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 26, 2009, 08:29:41 pm[/size][hr]with out the “” lmao[/quote]

Search For Pure You Will Find Something Like That
Then Just Change The XP For The Skill.
